parameters: The statue situated in the middle here is of the ancient
Many years ago this land was attacked by a dragon
However. the statue has sort of fell off the podium
He looks kinda sad. but the island in the middle could be a good place to chill
So i am building a bridge. itll take time but it will be done soon
Hmm. You arent from around here ma'am
Oh you come from Sunnyside. My son is a fisherman that goes there often
You should see what he's up to
Oh and say hello from me
What was all that rumbling. Hm
i was just about to finish my bridge across to the island
No matter. only a minor setback
Yeah... nice try. but there isnt anything behind this
The waterfall responds to your actions
Wow Who's the cute girl. She isnt from around here
Okay Fine. I dont actually have a spare key.
I was just joking Peks KEKW. Lets get back to Muercie
You cannot go back down there again
and you cant come in lmao
Ok maybe you can see what is inside.
YOU LITERALLY CAME OUT OF NOWHERE
Well anyway. i am here to show you the ropes
I feel like i aleady know what to do
Well in that case. if you think you are so smart
Okay but like i legit am.
Your ego is so over inflated
You'll probably need this since you're such a smartass
Just know that in this version of the world. things are a lot tougher.
Okay but at least make it intresting so i dont have to mash through 27 million textboxes
But first a little trolling must take place
You wont know when. You wont know where.
Anyway. lets give you the rundown
In this world. you'll find many of your friends.
As well as a few other familiar faces you've grew to love and hate in customs
Everyone you meet will have a unique quest of some kind for you to complete.
So i need to find Muercie first?
Where is she anyways. She doesnt even live here.
Muercie is in the house opposite to yours. She's visiting Poppin
Be carefull. She's a little snappy. She's kinda on a loss streak.
Dont you have something to do?
Okay but like help i am stuck.
This just in. local furry boy stopped by green blob
Fuck you i could beat you in a 1v1 any day of the week
COULD YOU BE ANY FUCKIN SLOWER MY GUY
Hi. This is my house. But you cannot come in
That and i dont think Shane could be bothered to make yet another house.
I mean its fine i guess. It more than makes up for it later on in the game. You'll see why
Dont you have something to do?
Hi. This is my house. But you cannot come in
Why is it such a mess \| \^
Actually, you know what. I'm not going to ask about it.
But Poppin asked me to come here to get the key to his farm.
Oh wait. Poppin sent you over? So he remembered monkaS
He left it at my farm. I wonder why he needs to use my farm when he has his own corn supply
Pretty corny behaviour if you ask me
Now. where was that key. ah yes. here it is
Oh and before you go. There is one more thing i forgot to tell you
Lets go over the art of Active Time Battles. or ATB for short
Are you stalling for time? this better be quick
Wow i didnt actually expect you to beat him.
Kinda forth wall breaking here but i should probably give you something cool as a reward
Anyway. Now back to the game
If you ever want to test your skills in combat. feel free to come back
You should hurry back to Poppin, You dont want to make him wait.
Hi. This is my house. You still cant come in
Do you want to open the training dummy tutorial
Wow i didnt actually expect you to beat him.
Kinda forth wall breaking here but i should probably give you something cool as a reward
Anyway. Now back to the game
Come back any time you want to test your skills
Hi Poppy. Welcome back to chat, How ya doing.
Ok i gotta ask. What's with all the armor.
I've never done a face reveal. So who knows what i look like
I can look as Cool, badass and edgy as i want haha
Anyway, I'm Just trying to work out where i put the key to my farm
I'm afraid to ask, but why do you have a cornfield...
Well you see, Muercie has considered going vegeterian.
Good thing she isnt forcing me to do the same... I'm a meat lad myself. I love it too much
I am not called the depressed fat man for nothing haha \}(fuck you Shane...)
Wait Shane is here too?? wtf did he do this time.
Anyway If you could help me find the key to this gate. It would mean a lot
Muercie has been cranky lately. She's fallen 3 ranks in the past 20 days
Last time i had the key i was visiting Blob, Could you go there for me? I'll try to force this bitch open
And how in the fuck do i do that? I'm not a wizard, I cant guess where people are Poppin
Did you hit your head or something while raging from Sekiro? His house is the one directly under yours
Fuck you Poppin i dont rage on Sekiro...
Yeah, yeah, love you too you bastard
Aha Peks. You got the key
Oh so it was at Blob's house...
I'm... You know what. It's best we dont get into that
Well you took so long that i was able to force it open with my fat man strength
NAH BUT LIKE WHY EVEN ASK IF YOU CAN DO THAT!
Nope. I didn't actually do that..
I just used the spare key.
OH MY GOD THATS EVEN FUCKING WORSE. FUCK YOU POPPIN
JESUS FUCKING CHRIST! CAN YOU STOP BLOB
I can't believe i got you twice.
Okay but like i didnt expect this game to go on for so long, I kind of forgot
I have been awaiting your return
You see i have been watching your progress.
That doesn't sound creepy at all... May i ask why and how?
You dont need to know that.
I would like to challenge you
To a game of League Of Legends
Uhh. can we cut for a second
Blob... as cool as that may be. We can't put that into the game.
Yeah. Yeah. Just go for plan B
uhh.. I am being told that it is not possible to play League Of Legends here
Honestly, i was quite looking forward to how that was going to be possible in this game
Well then. This is why you have a plan B
I Challenge you to a game of...
And remember when i said a little trolling will take place
Well. you're on your own. such a shame i wont explain how to play.
You dont have enough cards to play.
Ahh. this is a problem, You need at least 5 cards to play
If you're having trouble finding cards. You should go and see Pepper in Sunnyside.
They are in the house opposite Muercie
GET FUCKED! I DON'T EVEN KNOW THIS GAME AND I DESTROYED YOU BLOB!
The beauty of this card game is that there are no real winners or losers
You just swap cards. its pretty cool. keeps the card economy flowing
NOPE, YOU BE HUFFING A WHOLE HEAP OF COPIUM THERE. I CLEARLY WON HAHAHAHA
Anyway. listen up, You're on the home strech to meet everyone
While you were distracted trying to figure out how to play, I stole the orb and destroyed the tower that was blocking the path.
Okay cool, but maybe next time, ask
Go through the forest and take a left into the Lost Woods. The tower blocking the way should be gone now
In the Lost Woods, you'll find an ancient temple. You'll become completly based once you see what is over there
Hopefully 4 is still there. We kinda lost contact with him
Aww 4, Poor guy. I'll try and find him as soon as possible
While you're in the forest. take a detour to the north. it'll be worth your while
This marks the end of the tutorial
As Muercie said. Explore the world. Many things will change depending on who is in your party.
There are also some hidden cards to collect. The more you collect. The easier the endgame will be
Be sure to check Everywhere. While there is only one card per area. There is a secret sidequest to help with collecting cards
Be careful in the forest down south for powerfull enemies. Anyway, Have fun
The bucket is full of water.
Aha, there is a card inside.
I feel like Peks needs help...
I wonder if he is inting?
Yeah that was a crazy experiance
Thank you all for coming. its been an absolute pleasure. have a good night, good sleep and i'll catch you in the next one
He has no self awareness as to what actually happened
OKAYYYY POGGERS. Thank you so much for the raid. much appreciated.
What does he mean. does he mean all of us?
Not surprising given Peks's hate of Closed letterboxes with raised flags
Ah, brave peks, you've ventured far, beneath the eerie Halloween star,
Through twisted trees and shadows stark, a new path has opened through dark to dark.
A hidden realm now stirs and awakes,
Spirits rise, their silence breaks, doing which will seal your fate.
So enter now, if you dare tread, where goblins dance and spirits wed,
And may your journey be widespread, through the realms where we have led!"
Okay thank you but like. why must you speak in silly little riddles.
Speaking of silly little riddles. Rugo better not be fuckin involved with this
I might see if Muercie wants to go ghost hunting
The picture will stay on screen until you find the area.
Well done, dear travelers, bold and keen,
You've traversed the shadowed, spectral scene.
With wisdom found and courage shown,
You've claimed the hidden secrets as your own.
Through haunted woods and misty vale,
You've solved the mysteries of the ghostly tale.
May the courage that in dark places grows,
Light your way, wherever you go.
Okay can we like cut the rhyming bullshit please
Youve reached the end of the quest.
i hope you have fun with the rest....
I cant help it. its fun. but anyway. you're reward is none
What so all that for fuckin nothing
DING DING DING. PK. DING DING DING
Sorry Peks but i didnt write this one.
WAHHH WAHHH. What a surprise. Peks is crying again
